channel.title: Server help
channel.description: oaky so i have my server running on my laptop in my other room and my brotehr is using it for homework, so how can i use my desktop computer to log onto server? both computers are in same house is there any way i can??? i tried 127.0.0.1 and 0.0.0.0 but it doesent log me in and even when i tr to log in from webclient it doesent log me in.

item.title: Server help

item.description:
